definitions.title: n.m.
definitions.body: :Ju Jdg 9:15 bramble, buck-thorn (cf. Che Ps 58:10) (rhamnus, Ar. 0’at.ad As. eṭidu v. Dl:W, No. 153, Aram [[אַטְדָּא]] 0t.d0 cf. Löw:No. 15) contr. [[עֵחִים]] Ju Jdg 9:14, Jdg 9:15, Jdg 9:15 (personif., in fable); Ps 58:10 as fuel (in fig., cf. Che); ´[[כְּגׁרֶן הָא]], n.loc., Ge 5:10, Ge 5:11 (v. [[גּׁרֶן]] & [[אבל מחרים]]).
